Control Name: 3.4.1 You have a capacity model for the workload.
Control Statement: A capacity model should describe the relationships between the utilization of various components as a ratio, to capture when and how application components should scale-out.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 3.4 How have you accounted for capacity and scaling requirements of your workload?
control_attributes.Control: 3.4.1 You have a capacity model for the workload.
control_attributes.Description: A capacity model should describe the relationships between the utilization of various components as a ratio, to capture when and how application components should scale-out.
